'''Five-Lantern Festival Gate''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Five-Lantern Festival Gate is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest east of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] on [[Shirikoro Peak]]. It is normally available on the third day of Tsurumi Island's [[Tsurumi Island#Three-Day Cycle|Three-Day Cycle]]; however, it is possible for Remarkable Chests to appear on different days if the cycle becomes desynced.
